An industrial design & engineering studio.

Founded by Jaap Huijgen and supported
by a solid network of creatives and makers.

‘Change for Better’ is about positive impact.
Contributing by creating products for a world that will last.

I'm committed to make a project into a success.
Endurance and constructive collaboration througout the process.

With an interest for chaos, an urge for structure, balance as a goal.
Here to create!
